text: K. R. Mohanan (11 December 1947 â€“ 25 June 2017) was an Indian movie director. He was best known for his critically acclaimed works, Ashwathama (1978), Purushartham (1987) and Swaroopam (1992). He studied at the Pune Film Institute. Mohanan was the Chairman of Kerala State Chalachitra Academy from 2006 to 2011 and the Director of International Film Festival of Kerala. Mohanan died on 25 June 2017 of stomach cancer, aged 69. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:Cancer deaths in India Category:Indian movie directors
title: K. R. Mohanan
